Keys.Name: Scale By Level
Keys.Description: Amount required for bribes scales with the players level

Keys.Name: Base Bribe Amount
Keys.Description: The starting amount required for a bribe before scaling

Keys.Name: Influenced By Personality
Keys.Description: Personality can decrease (or increase) the amount required for a bribe.

Sections.Name: Experimental
Sections.Description: Disable if use of this mod causes the game to error or crash. Experimental Features use a .NET technique known as Reflection that may not run correctly on all platforms.

Keys.Name: Get NPC Data
Keys.Description: Enables advanced NPC data, useful for more complex responses.

Keys.Name: NPC Knowledge
Keys.Description: Enables the ability to access existing NPC knowledge checks.
